# Sunrise Roofers - Tucson, Arizona
> Professional Roofing Services in Tucson and Surrounding Areas

## Business Overview
Sunrise Roofers is a professional roofing company serving Tucson, Arizona and surrounding communities including Catalina Foothills, Oro Valley, Marana, Sahuarita, and Green Valley. We specialize in residential and commercial roofing solutions designed for Arizona's extreme climate conditions.

## Core Services
- Roof Replacement: Complete roof replacement services for all types of roofing materials using Arizona-tested materials built to withstand extreme heat and monsoon seasons
- Roof Repair: Fast, reliable roof repairs for leaks, storm damage, and wear with 24/7 emergency service available
- Roof Inspection: Comprehensive roof inspections to identify potential issues with honest assessments and free estimates
- Shingle Roofing: Professional asphalt shingle installation using top brands like GAF, Owens Corning, and CertainTeed with UV protection
- Tile Roofing: Specialized concrete and clay tile installation perfect for Arizona's climate, lasting 30+ years
- Metal Roofing: Energy-efficient metal roof installation that reduces cooling costs by up to 30%, lasting 50+ years and withstanding monsoon winds
- Flat Roof Coating & TPO Roofing: Expert flat roof services including TPO installation, protective coatings, and restoration using premium materials from Polyglass, Johns Manville, and Tucson Rubberized Coating
